KFF健康新闻“什么健康？”：联邦卫生机构不确定特朗普政府可以拒绝通过国会解雇联邦工人和取消现有合同来花钱吗？如果法院说不能，政府会遵守这些指令吗？随着最高法院的权衡，本周的主要对抗将越来越近，表明联邦政府无法拒绝为已经提供的服务付费。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/kff-health-news-what-what-the-the-health-the-state-state-fenderal-health-health-agencies-is-uncney.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/kff-health-news-what-what-the-health-the-health-the-state-state-federal-health-health-agecies-is-is-unclent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97E9B932-A5FE-4D77-BE9F-17F-17F5B17A1252 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 20:22:54 -0500 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': The state of federal health agencies is uncertain
蒸发可能会减少香烟，但不会帮助吸烟者戒烟一项大型的美国研究发现，每天的烟气并不能增加长期的戒烟，而非每日烟会积极降低戒烟率。电子烟可能会延长尼古丁的依赖性，而不是帮助吸烟者退出。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/vaping-might-cut-cut-cut-cut-cut-cut-but-wont-help-smokers-quit-quit-nicotine-nicotine-for-good.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/vaping-might-cut-cut-cut-cut-cut-cigarettes-but-wont-help-smokers-quit-quit-nicotine-for-good.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b4069d4-0d90-49Ad-946E-8A52E178FA90 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 20:09:00 -0500 Vaping might cut cigarettes, but won't help smokers quit nicotine for good
全球研究发现水果和蔬菜消费降低了疾病的风险 - 为什么我们吃得不够？科学家确认水果和蔬菜减少了糖尿病，心脏病的风险，但强调迫切需要清楚癌症保护机制。可持续的水实践和有针对性的政策行动对于更广泛的采用至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/global-study-finds-finds-finds-fruit-and-vetable-consumption-cuts-disease-disease-riske28094Why-Arent-arent-arent-arent-arent-arent-we-eating-eating-enough.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/global-study-finds-finds-finds-finds-fruit-and-vetable-consumption-cuts-disease-disease-riske28094why-arent-arent-arent-we-we-we--eating-eating-enough.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5accce1c-4aab-4aab-432a-b7e0-d9e4ab5b75e3 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 19:37:00 -0500 Global study finds fruit and vegetable consumption cuts disease risk—why aren't we eating enough?
想要稳定的血糖吗？研究表明，早睡时间更长的睡眠时间使用连续的葡萄糖监测的研究人员发现，就寝时间习惯和睡眠长度如何直接影响您的血糖稳定性，将睡眠视为管理糖尿病风险和代谢健康的强大工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/want-stable-blood-sugar-go-to-to-be-to-bed-earlier-and-and-sleep------------------------------------sleep-longer-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/want-stable-blood-sugar-go-to-to-to-bed-earlier-and-slelier-and-sleep-leep-long------------comments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7160A1B7-37C4-48C0-851E-97DDAA6B5C7A Thu, 06 Mar 2025 18:59:00 -0500 Want stable blood sugar? Go to bed earlier and sleep longer, study reveals
定期打呼nor？如果您患有妊娠糖尿病，您的糖尿病风险会跳跃睡眠时间短，频繁打s可显着增加患有先前妊娠糖尿病的女性2型糖尿病的风险。常规打s也与较差的葡萄糖代谢生物标志物有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/snoring-regularly-your-your-daibetes-risk-wumps-if-if-you-had-gestational-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/snoring-regularly-your-your-daibetes-risk-jump--jumps-if-you-had-gestation-diabetational.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57B27205-88B7-4E1D-BD8D-358D55ED00458 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 18:32:00 -0500 Snoring regularly? Your diabetes risk jumps if you had gestational diabetes
在用餐中放开手机可切断青少年的垃圾食品摄入量在餐点期间，由手机或社交媒体分散注意力的青少年消耗了更多的超级加工食品，并且对地中海饮食的依从性较低。促进正念饮食可以帮助青少年提高饮食质量和整体健康状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/putting-away-phone-phones-during-meals-cuts-cuts-junk-food-intake-intake-mong-among-among-teens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/putting-away-phone-during-meals-cuts-cuts-junk-food-ink-food-intake-intake-among-among-teens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7f6e825-9A40-440-44EA-A87D-A87D-AFD3692ECF2C Thu, 06 Mar 2025 17:43:00 -0500 Putting away phones during meals cuts junk food intake among teens
吃超级加工的食物会损害您的肠道 - 在这里炎症需要超级加工的食物破坏了肠道微生物组平衡，导致炎症，微生物多样性降低并增加肠道渗透性。这种微生物组失衡会导致包括糖尿病，IBD，癌症和神经系统疾病在内的慢性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/eating-ultra-processed-foods-harms-harms-your-gute28094 heree28099s-how-inflammation-how-inflammation-takes-takes-hold.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/eating-ultra-processed-foods-harms-harms-your-gute28094 heree28099s-how-inflammation-how-inflammation-takes-takes-takes-hold.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66ff709-4DD0-45F6-8F4F4F4F-FFD896661EA52 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 16:59:00 -0500 Eating ultra-processed foods harms your gut—here’s how inflammation takes hold
糖尿病改变了乳腺癌的生物学，研究表明超过1.2亿美国人患有糖尿病或糖尿病前。三阴性乳腺癌（TNBC）是乳腺癌最具侵略性的形式，肥胖驱动糖尿病的TNBC患者通常会有较差的预后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/diabetes-changes-the-biology-ology-ology-ogy-of--breast-cancer-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/diabetes-changes-changes-the-biology-oology-of--breast-cancer-cancer-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99fdec06-1b15-4e79-bf6d-a29423b346a1 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 12:35:29 -0500 Diabetes changes the biology of breast cancer, study shows
研究人员发现为什么硬皮病比男性对女性更大由特殊外科医院研究人员（HSS）领导的两项新研究发现了驱动全身性硬化症（SSC）或硬皮病的关键生物学机制 - 一种罕见且通常是毁灭性的自身免疫性疾病，会引起纤维化（组织硬化）和炎症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/researchers-discover-why-scleroderma-aftects-women-more-more-more-than-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/researchers-discover-discover-why-scleroderma-aftects-women-more-more-more-than-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24cf9807-a3d7-41e5-ab9e-71d11de05a7f Thu, 06 Mar 2025 12:30:38 -0500 Researchers discover why scleroderma affects women more than men
突破性研究定义了免疫疗法和肝移植的理想间隔肝细胞癌（HCC）约占原发性肝癌病例的80％至90％。根据世界卫生组织的数据，在全球范围内，2020年注册了905,700例新病例和830,200例死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/breakthrough-study-defines-defines-indeal-interval-for-immunotheraphy-and-munotheraphy-and-liver-liver-transplants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/breakthrough-study-defines-defines-indeal-interval-for-mmunotheraphy-and-munotheraphy-and-liver-liver-transplants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82057d4e-c5e1-4edf-ad9a-93ac2baaac1fe Thu, 06 Mar 2025 12:30:20 -0500 Breakthrough study defines ideal interval for immunotherapy and liver transplants
